item.title: The LEARCredential
item.description: The LEARCredential is a machine-readable legal document representing an electonic Mandate (known also as Company Authorization Letter). In this context, the term Mandate is used to describe the concept of delegating specific permissions and powers to an employee of an organisation, enabling that employee to act on behalf of the company in a specific set of matters or tasks. We explicitly focus on the business environment and do not cover natural persons acting as citizens.

item.title: Authentication
item.description: DOME uses Verifiable Credentials for authentication and access control of the users interacting with the DOME services. In this document we describe how you can integrate the DOME authentication mechanism in your own applications. It is very easy.
